accepted_answer.excerpt:
BaseFalconSwerve (and most other swerve templates) will check that the speed of the desired state is above some threshold before steering the wheel, since you usually never want to steer a stopped wheel. 
There are a few ways around this, what I did was probably a bit janky but it works. Basically I…
